title: Right to Information Act
description: This act empowers citizens to seek information from public authorities, promoting transparency and accountability in governance.

title: Companies Act
description: When starting a company, follow the registration process and comply with legal requirements. This includes transparent operations and proper financial reporting.

title: Right of Children to Free and Compulsory Education Act
description: Children aged 6 to 14 must receive free education. Schools and the government must ensure that all children have access to quality education.

title: The Epidemic Diseases Act
description: In case of an epidemic, follow government guidelines for quarantine and public health measures to prevent the spread of disease.

title: Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules
description: If you handle personal data, ensure you use secure practices to protect it from unauthorized access. Follow rules to keep data safe and private.

title: Transfer of Property Act
description: When buying or selling property, ensure the transfer is legally documented and fair. Follow procedures for registration and ensure all rights and responsibilities are clear.

title: Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code
description: If facing financial difficulties, this code helps you through debt recovery or liquidation processes. It provides a structured way to resolve insolvency issues.

title: Indian Penal Code
description: This code outlines what constitutes a crime and the punishments for various offenses. Understand the laws to avoid legal trouble and ensure justice.

title: Indian Contract Act
description: Contracts are legally binding agreements. Ensure clarity in terms and conditions to avoid disputes and ensure fair dealings.

title: Goods and Services Tax Act
description: This tax applies to the supply of goods and services. Understanding compliance and filing processes is essential for businesses.

title: Negotiable Instruments Act
description: This act regulates instruments like cheques and promissory notes. Ensure proper usage to avoid disputes and ensure payment security.

title: Representation of the People Act
description: This act regulates elections in India, ensuring free and fair voting. Know your rights as a voter to participate in democracy effectively.
